definition: Sha county in Sanming 三明[San1 ming2], Fujian
Changsha county in Changsha 長沙|长沙[Chang2 sha1], Hunan
Jinsha county in Bijie prefecture 畢節地區|毕节地区[Bi4 jie2 di4 qu1], Guizhou
Yéngisar nahiyisi (Yengisar county) in Kashgar prefecture 喀什地區|喀什地区[Ka1 shi2 di4 qu1], west Xinjiang

sentences.english: I would stick with A Sand County Almanac, and pass on Hands-On Environmentalism.
sentences.chinese: 我將繼續支持一本沙縣年鑑，並且轉交實踐的環境論。

sentences.english: The world has shrunk to those mean dimensions known to county clerks.
sentences.chinese: 世界變得渺小，迴歸到沙縣書記員所知的平庸維度。

definition: zha jiang mian: ground pork simmered with salty fermented soybean paste (or other sauce) over thick wheat noodles
rice noodle soup from Yunnan province
the Manchu Han imperial feast, a legendary banquet in the Qing dynasty/(fig.) a sumptuous banquet
Dongan county in Yongzhou 永州[Yong3 zhou1], Hunan/Dong'an district of Mudanjiang city 牡丹江市, Heilongjiang
Sichuan noodles with a spicy and numbing sauce
hot spicy soup (often sold in street stalls)
rice noodle roll, a roll made from sheets of rice flour dough, steamed and stuffed with meat, vegetables etc
